00053 template<unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00054 class AbstractCardiacCellFactory
00055 {

00084                                       unsigned lo, unsigned hi);

00087 
00094     AbstractCardiacCellFactory(AbstractIvpOdeSolver* pSolver = new EulerIvpOdeSolver);

00101
